Definition at line 61 of file Memoire_ptr.cpp.

References Cerr, data, Double_ptr_trav(), Process::exit(), finl, lock_, next, and sz.

Referenced by Memoire::add_trav_double().

{
  if(sz==-1)
    {
      sz=n;
      data=new double[sz];
      if(!data)
        {
          Cerr << "Not enough memory " << finl;
          Process::exit();
        }
      lock_=1;
      next=0;
      return this;
    }
  if ( (!lock_) && (sz==n))
    {
      lock_=1;
      return this;
    }
  Double_ptr_trav* curseur=this;
  while(curseur->next)
    {
      curseur=curseur->next;
      if ( (!curseur->lock_) && (curseur->sz==n))
        {
          curseur->lock_=1;
          return curseur;
        }
    }
  curseur->next= new Double_ptr_trav();
  if(!curseur->next)
    {
      Cerr << "Not enough memory " << finl;
      Process::exit();
    }
  curseur=curseur->next;
  curseur->sz=n;
  curseur->data=new double[n];
  if(!data)
    {
      Cerr << "Not enough memory " << finl;
      Process::exit();
    }
  curseur->lock_=1;
  curseur->next=0;
  return curseur;
}
